title: How to Make a Pitcher of Pina Coladas

steps.title: Measure the ingredients.
steps.content: Measure the ingredients. Pour the ingredients (except the garnish and ice) into a pitcher that can hold 100 ounces. [1] X Research source Stir the cream of coconut thoroughly before adding it into the pitcher.

steps.title: Stir the ingredients.
steps.content: Stir the ingredients. Ensure everything is mixed thoroughly.

steps.title: Refrigerate the pitcher.
steps.content: Refrigerate the pitcher. Allow the mixture to chill in the refrigerator until ready to serve. This drink can also be served immediately. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Add the crushed ice to the pitcher.
steps.content: Add the crushed ice to the pitcher. Give the mixture a final and rapid stir.

steps.title: Pour the mixture into tall glasses.
steps.content: Pour the mixture into tall glasses. Distribute the pitcher mixture evenly between 8-ounce tall glasses. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Garnish the drinks.
steps.content: Garnish the drinks. Add a half-slice of pineapple and maraschino cherry on the side of each glass. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Make different flavors of pina coladas.
steps.content: Make different flavors of pina coladas. Share them amongst your friends. Banana pina coladas Berry pina coladas Mango pina coladas Melon pina coladas Pina colada floats
